why_choose.title: Why Choose MEGA+ Towing?
why_choose.feature1_desc: Available anytime, day or night, for emergency situations.
why_choose.feature2_desc: Professional vehicle recovery and towing since 2008. MEGA+ brand established in 2018.
why_choose.feature3_desc: Thousands of successful operations completed with satisfied customers.
why_choose.feature4_desc: Certified and trained operators with state-of-the-art equipment.

service_area.title: Our Service Area
service_area.intro: We provide 24/7 professional towing and recovery services in Georgia, mostly in Rustavi. Response time: 15-20 minutes in Rustavi, up to 45 minutes in remote locations.
service_area.response_time_text: 15-30 min in Rustavi • 30-45 min outside city
service_area.available_text: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year

location_widget.title: Tell Us Your Location
location_widget.subtitle: Fastest way to get help - send your location now
location_widget.note: We serve Georgia • Response time: 15-40 minutes

evacuator.title: Evacuator
evacuator.desc: Professional evacuation and towing service for all vehicle types. Our evacuators handle vehicles safely and efficiently from any location.

crane.title: Crane Service
crane.desc: Heavy lifting solutions with our specialized crane equipment. Perfect for vehicles in difficult positions or heavy recovery situations.

special_equipment.title: Special Equipment
special_equipment.desc: Advanced equipment for specialized recovery and towing needs. From rotators to stabilizers, we have the tools for any situation.

starting.title: Starting the Car
starting.desc: Quick battery jump-start service to get your vehicle running. Professional assistance for dead batteries and starting issues.

door.title: Opening Car Door
door.desc: Professional lockout service to safely open your vehicle without damage. Expert assistance when you're locked out of your car.

fuel.title: Fuel Delivery
fuel.desc: Emergency fuel delivery service when you run out of gas. We bring fuel directly to your location.

tire.title: Tire Change Service
tire.desc: Professional tire repair and replacement service on the roadside. Get help with flat tires and tire issues quickly.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact_page.required_text: * Required field. For emergencies, call us directly at +995 551 305 305
contact_page.email_response: We reply as soon as possible

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! MEGA+ Towing is available every day, 24 hours, 365 days a year. Even at 3am or on holidays, we're here to help.
faq.a2: Our average response time is 20-30 minutes, depending on your location.
faq.a3: We serve in Georgia, mostly Rustavi.
faq.a4: Pricing depends on distance, vehicle type, and required service. Price in Rustavi is starting from 40 GEL
faq.a5: Absolutely! We have experience with luxury, sports, and exotic vehicles. Our team knows how to handle these special cars with care.

footer.company_desc: Professional towing and recovery services available 24/7.
